sentences.en: A gross deception has been practised on both of us.
sentences.cn: 咱们都陷入了可耻的骗局呀!

sentences.en: A man of moral integrity never resorts to deception.
An extreme school of " disarmers " pronounced stable deterrence was a dangerous deception.
sentences.cn: “ 裁军论者”中的极端派声称,稳定的威摄是一种危险的骗局.

sentences.en: Even the President helped out in this particular deception.
sentences.cn: 甚至总统亦否认此种谣传.

sentences.en: Every form of deception and every obstacle baffled the Allied Commission.
sentences.cn: 用尽一切欺瞒和阻挠的手段来避开协约国委员会的耳目.

sentences.en: Haskell did not live to discover the deception.
sentences.cn: 哈斯克尔至死都没识破那个骗局。

sentences.en: He admitted conspiring to obtain property by deception.
sentences.cn: 他承认曾与人合谋骗取财产。

sentences.en: He believes many "psychics" are frauds who rely on perception and subtle deception.
sentences.cn: 他认为许多“通灵者”都是骗子，他们都是靠直觉和巧妙的骗术蒙人。

sentences.en: He was convicted of obtaining money by deception .
sentences.cn: 他被判犯有诈骗钱财罪。

sentences.en: He was jailed for two years for fraud and deception.
sentences.cn: 他因为诈骗和欺诈入狱服刑两年。

sentences.en: Human beings have an infinite capacity for self-deception.
sentences.cn: 人类自欺的本事是无穷的。

sentences.en: She didn’t have the courage to admit to her deception.
sentences.cn: 她没有勇气承认自己的欺骗行为。

sentences.en: She was silent for some minutes, struggling with her own self - deception.
sentences.cn: 她沉默了一会, 极力掩饰自己.

sentences.en: The deception could not continue after this.
sentences.cn: 话说到这里,这种蒙蔽当然不能再继续下去了.

sentences.en: They attempted to practice deception on the public.
sentences.cn: 他们企图蒙骗公众耳目.

sentences.en: This made Tom sadder than his deception.
sentences.cn: 这比受骗更令汤姆难受.

sentences.en: You've been the victim of a rather cruel deception.
sentences.cn: 你是一场相当残忍的骗局的受害者。

trans.tran_en: the act of deliberately making someone believe something that is not true
